IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: Education/Independent K-12th Grade School Mission: To be a Christian school of academic excellence by providing each student a diverse college preparatory education guided by Christian principles and beliefs; by challenging and nurturing the mind, body, spirit; and by developing responsible stewardship in our changing world.
IRS990.MissionDescription: Education/Independent K-12th Grade School To be a Christian school of academic excellence by providing each student a diverse college preparatory education guided by Christian principles and beliefs by challenging and nurturing the mind, body, spirit and by developing responsible stewardship in our changing world.
IRS990.Description: Education Program Service: Wesleyan is an independent k-12th grade school with a college preparatory curriculum in 3 divisions..Lower School, Middle School, and High School ...located on 80+ acres with 8 main buildings, 9 faculty houses, 3 chapels, 2 libraries, 2 dining halls, and 7 computer labs. For the Arts programs, there is a 480 seat theater, a black box theater, drawing, painting and ceramic rooms, middle and high school bands and chorale studios. For Athletics, there are 4 gyms, 7 tennis courts, a football stadium and track, a 10 lane/2 divewell natatorium, baseball stadium, softball stadium, large fields for soccer and lacrosse, and a full cross country trail. Starting enrollment for the year was 1091. The 105 graduates were accepted to 103 different colleges and universities. $4,318,239 in scholarship money was offered and there were 14 athletic scholarships.

NameBusiness.BusinessNameLine1: Blue Cross Blue Shield of Georgia

Board determines and approves the Headmaster's compensation.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: 990 Return is made available for review by the Finance Committee of the Board of Trustees of for the full Board of Trustees at any time by request.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 12c
Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Comparable information obtained by the Board chairman and appropriate compensation of Headmaster reviewed,discussed and approved in a formal Board meeting. Other key employees' as well as all other employees' compensation reviewed/recommended by Headmaster within the operating budgetary constraints and discussed with Board Chairman. Amounts normally obtained by a percentage adjustment which is discussed in the Finance Committee during the annual budget approval process...and formally presented and approved by the full Board of Trustees.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, Line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Documents are available for review upon written request.
